name: Keep Them Alive!
description:
Controls:

W,A,S,D |   Q (A)   |   E (B)  |  ESC (Start)  

How to play:

Survive as many waves as possible. Start a wave by interacting with the obelisk. Spend your atribute points on the portrait thing. Tell your Allies how to position, what to target and what to equip!

I will write details about the project here later, but I really have no time right now, apologies! If you stumble upon my game already, please leave me feedback! :)
